description: Fully unmarked wilderness paddling route with multiple portages from Cape Pond (Tors Cove) to Peak Pond (Salmonier Line). Permit required for entry. Expect to spend 3-5 days.
directions: Drive Route 10, turn off onto Cape Pond Rd. Drive in about 15km to dam on Cape Pond. Road becomes quite rough, jeep or truck recommended.
title: Avalon Wilderness Reserve - Cape Pond to Peak Pond - Paddling Route
